3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.

17 November 2020  · 

Quick update!

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.
Note: No action is required, although if you have ThreeFold Connect installed already, you may have to update the app before the name changes on your device.

techapp

Announcing the November 2020 community call

Mark your calendars! Next Monday November 2nd at 5pm CET we will host a 30-minute community call to update you on exciting progress and to show you what we’ll be working towards in the coming months.

Liquid security breach, action suggested

We have just been informed there has been a security incident at Liquid.com. Although no funds seem to have been affected by the breach, Liquid.com does recommend all customers to change their password and 2FA at their earliest convenience.
